translation.Saudades: Missing the golden times and the ballads of Saturday night? We're here to get you back on track.
translation.VariasOpcoes: With a huge amount of options
translation.Afinal: Why all this work from our part ?
translation.Independente: Regardless of your taste and why, we do it because we want to relive the emotions of listening to music, remembering the good times and rescuing the importance of music and its influence in our lives. And vinyl records make us have this nostalgia
translation.AMusica: Music is an art, and we wanted to contribute to it. We were founded in 2017 and since then, we have been working hard to deliver these works to homes, it is a delicate and fragile art, but with a powerful meaning, and we show this in our deliveries.
translation.FiqueSabendo: Get the latest news and articles to your inbox every month !
translation.VoceQuerColocar: Do you want to add this product to your cart ?
translation.EsteItemVaiFicar: This item will be available in the cart
translation.AoSeCadastrar: By signing up, you agree with our
translation.ParaEntrar: There's no secret to enter, register and come enjoy!
translation.AFestaEstaBombando: The party is booming here, the only thing missing is you here with us.
